long_description: The concept is simple: a plane on a tether. But the design and performance are anything but ordinary. The SkyTrix Kite from Daydream Toy can climb, dive, loop and boomerang, all without batteries. The people-powered SkyTrix Kite is a radically new design in flying toys-it can glide more than 200 ft., no wind required. Great for a long-distance game of catch between multiple people or a game of boomerang on your own. As you learn the feel and possibilities of the tether, you can start doing tricks such as casting, snap backs, and loops. SkyTrix Kite from Daydream Toy does not use batteries or a gyroscope, and is designed for ages 8 and up.
short_description: The concept is simple: a plane on a tether. But the design and performance are anything but ordinary. The SkyTrix Kite from Daydream Toy can climb, dive, loop and boomerang, all without batteries.
